sources.title: 1907 A Little Girl Who Did Not Believe In Santa Claus
sources.description: Two short films by Edwin S. Porter

metadata.Plot: This is the story of a master toymaker who discovers a magical kingdom of elves in the North Pole and becomes Santa Claus. But when Santa's eager-to-please elf Patch leaves the North Pole for the big streets of New York City, he becomes mixed up with a dastardly toy tycoon's plans to take over Christmas. And so begins Santa's adventure - to rescue his faithful elf and to save Christmas for all the children of the world!
metadata.Actors: Dudley Moore, John Lithgow, David Huddleston
